extra.message: Detected a formatted string in a SQL statement. This could lead to SQL injection if variables in the SQL statement are not properly sanitized. Use a prepared statements (java.sql.PreparedStatement) instead. You can obtain a PreparedStatement using 'connection.prepareStatement'.

cwe: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
